about_the_game:
Tank Hangar Simulator

In Your Own Hangar You Can Both Repair Tanks and Build Your Own Tank and Join the War!
Our character is a Tank Engineer and Tank Commander. He Earns Money By Repairing Damaged Tanks In Our Hangar. And He Gets His Own Tank And Joins The Battles.

Build Your Own Tank and Join Battles!
Repair and Fix Broken Tanks and Earn Money!
Buy New Tank Templates for Your Tanks and Repair Them and Join Battles!!
Battle System! After creating your own tank, you can join in battles and Earn money from battles!.
HQ AI System in Battles.
7+ HQ Tank Models (Tiger,Sherman,T-34,KV-1,PzKpfw and More!)



Build Your Own Tank!


Buy Tank Parts,Build Your Own Tank and Join Battles!



Repair Customers Tanks!


Buy Tank Parts, Repair Customers Broken Tanks and Earn Money!



Join Battles!


If you have a own tank.. Join a battle!
If you win you will make money, but if you lose it will be costly for you!

About the Game

Tank Hangar Simulator

In Your Own Hangar You Can Both Repair Tanks and Build Your Own Tank and Join the War!
Our character is a Tank Engineer and Tank Commander. He Earns Money By Repairing Damaged Tanks In Our Hangar. And He Gets His Own Tank And Joins The Battles.
